hello sir,

      I m having some problem in reading binary files in java
which r written by C programs  .I have used 
DataInputStream,FileInputStream but can't read those files.

       With RandomAccessFile I can read int,char & short but can't 
read float values properly.

       If u have any solution then kindly send it to me

                                                 HImanshu
